content: but a sc25 turn total 25 sts row 12 any color but a change to color a when finishing the last st sc25 decline single_crochet sc2 turn total 28 sts row 13 color a sc28 turn total 28 sts separating row row 1 color a sc28 decline single_crochet sc24 decline single_crochet sc19 decline single_crochet sc24 decline single_crochet sc19 decline single_crochet sc6 turn total 125 sts row 2 color a sc125 turn total 125 sts repeat sections 1 2 3 4 5 6 followed by separating row 1 & 2 as many times as you want add border of your choice the pattern sample border round 1 color a single_crochet around entire blanket working 3sc into each corner st slip_stitch into 1st st round 2 any color but a crab st around entire blanket slip_stitch into 1st st cut the yarn fasten_off hide the tails the written pattern is available on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/bebablanket etsy https //www etsy com/shop/bebablanketdesigns you can use the pattern to create any item you want and sell your finished item if you wish but you have no right to claim that this pattern is created by you neither to sell the pattern nor to share the file of the written pattern and/or videos you have no right to create a video tutorial for this pattern without my written permission when sharing your creation on social media please include for facebook name of the pattern and link to the pattern on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/unicorn-dreams for instagram tag the designer #bebablanket and the pattern name #unicorndreams thank you for your valuable support the pattern is created by bebablanket february 2020 https //www ravelry com/designers/bebablanket https //www etsy com/shop/bebablanketdesigns first released at crochet now magazine issue 59 www crochetnow co uk
